name: Jimmy Clanton
description: '''Jimmy Clanton''' (born September 2, 1938) is an American singer who became known as the "[[swamp pop]] [[Rhythm and blues|R&B]] [[Teen idol|teenage idol]]". His band recorded a hit song "[[Just a Dream (Jimmy Clanton song)|Just a Dream]]" which Clanton had written in 1958 for the [[Ace Records (US)|Ace Records]] label. It reached number four on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[record chart|chart]] and sold a million copies. Clanton performed on [[Dick Clark]]'s ''[[American Bandstand]]'' and toured with popular artists like [[Fats Domino]], [[Jerry Lee Lewis]] and [[the Platters]].
